title: Naming Convention Sheet
description: Defines naming conventions per culture or sovereign power: name order, typical name count, common affixes, compound surname rules, and name change triggers. Suffixes and prefixes build cultural naming consistency.

culture_id.description: The culture these conventions belong to

typical_name_count.description: How many names a person typically has

given_name_conventions.description: How given names are chosen (meaning, ancestor, occupation)

surname_conventions.description: How surnames work (inherited, place-based, occupation-based, patronymic)

compound_surname_rules.description: How compound surnames work (father-mother order, hyphenation)

name_change_triggers.description: Events that cause name changes (coming of age, marriage, gaining magic, immigration)

forbidden_names.description: Names that are restricted or forbidden

naming_inspirations.description: What inspires names (traits, occupations, places, ancestors)

syllable_target.description: Target syllable count (1-3 ideal, rarely exceed 4)

x-cross-references.culture-profile: These conventions belong to a culture
x-cross-references.name-registry: Names following these conventions are tracked in the Name Registry
x-cross-references.naming-language-brief: Language brief provides the phonological foundation
